mapper.sql: #where() 1=1 #set($_p = $_parameter.condition) #if($_p.itemCodeList.size()>0) AND #repeat( $_p.itemCodeList $_code "," " t.ITEM_CODE IN (" ")" ) @{_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} #end #end #if($_p.monthKey && $_p.monthKey != '') AND t.MONTH_KEY = @{_p.monthKey} #end #if($_p.start && $_p.start != '') AND t.MONTH_KEY >= @{_p.start} #end #if($_p.end && $_p.end != '') AND t.MONTH_KEY <= @{_p.end} #end #if($_p.deptIdList.size()>0) AND #repeat( $_p.deptIdList $_idss "," " t.DEPT_ID IN (" ")" ) @{_idss,jdbcType=NUMERIC} #end #end #if($_p.nhType && $_p.nhType != '') AND t3.NH_TYPE = @{_p.nhType} #end AND T2.PID != 0 #end
mapper.select:
SELECT t1.id as deptId, t1.PID as pid, t1.name as deptName, #if($_databaseId == 'oracle') nvl(ROUND(SUM (t.TOTAL_MONTH_VALUE),0),0) TOTAL_MONTH_VALUE, CASE when nvl(ROUND(SUM(t.TOTAL_YOY),0),0) < nvl(ROUND(sum(t.TOTAL_MONTH_VALUE),0),0) then 1 when nvl(ROUND(SUM(t.TOTAL_YOY),0),0) = nvl(ROUND(SUM (t.TOTAL_MONTH_VALUE),0),0) then 0 else -1 end as tbzl #else ISNULL(ROUND(SUM (t.TOTAL_MONTH_VALUE),0),0) TOTAL_MONTH_VALUE, CASE when ISNULL(ROUND(SUM(t.TOTAL_YOY),0),0) < ISNULL(ROUND(SUM (t.TOTAL_MONTH_VALUE),0),0) then 1 when ISNULL(ROUND(SUM(t.TOTAL_YOY),0),0) = ISNULL(ROUND(SUM (t.TOTAL_MONTH_VALUE),0),0) then 0 else -1 end as tbzl #end FROM (SELECT T3.DEPT_ID, t3.TOTAL_MONTH_VALUE, t3.TOTAL_YOY FROM NH_D_DEPT_MONTH T3
#where() 1=1 #if($_parameter.itemCodeList.size()>0) and #repeat( $_parameter.itemCodeList $_code "," " T3.ITEM_CODE IN (" ")" ) @{_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} #end #end #if($_parameter.monthKey && $_parameter.monthKey != '') AND T3.MONTH_KEY = @{_parameter.monthKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR} #end #end ) t RIGHT JOIN VIEW_NH_D_DEPT t1 ON t1.id = T .dept_id
GROUP BY t1.ID, t1.PID, t1.name order by t1.ID

SELECT t.ITEM_CODE, t2.id, t2.NAME as deptName, t.MONTH_KEY, t.TOTAL_MONTH_VALUE, t.TOTAL_YOY FROM NH_D_DEPT_MONTH t INNER JOIN NH_DEPT t2 ON t.DEPT_ID = t2.id
1=1 AND t.ITEM_CODE = #{itemCode} AND t.MONTH_KEY = #{monthKey}

SELECT t.DEPT_ID as deptId, t.ITEM_CODE, T3.NAME AS itemName, t2.NAME as deptName, t.MONTH_KEY, t.TOTAL_MONTH_VALUE, t.TOTAL_YOY, NVL(T4.TOTAL_MONTH_VALUE,0) as lastMonth, NVL(t.TOTAL_MONTH_VALUE/t2.AREA,0) as untilEle, NVL(t2.AREA,0) AS area FROM NH_D_DEPT_MONTH t LEFT JOIN NH_DEPT t2 ON t.DEPT_ID = t2.id LEFT JOIN NH_ITEM t3 ON t3.STANDARD_CODE = T.ITEM_CODE LEFT JOIN NH_D_DEPT_MONTH t4 ON t4.MONTH_KEY = to_char(add_months(to_date(T.month_key,'yyyy-mm'),-1),'yyyy-mm') AND T.DEPT_ID = T4.DEPT_ID AND t.ITEM_CODE = T4.ITEM_CODE
#order($_parameter.condition,"t.MONTH_KEY DESC")

SELECT t.DEPT_ID as deptId, t.ITEM_CODE, T3.NAME AS itemName, t2.NAME as deptName, t.MONTH_KEY, t.TOTAL_MONTH_VALUE, t.TOTAL_YOY, ISNULL(T4.TOTAL_MONTH_VALUE,0) as lastMonth, cast(( CASE WHEN t2.AREA =0 THEN NULLIF(t.TOTAL_MONTH_VALUE / NULL, 0) ELSE NULLIF(t.TOTAL_MONTH_VALUE / t2.AREA, 0) END ) as Decimal) AS untilEle, ISNULL(t2.AREA,0) AS area
#order($_parameter.condition,"t.MONTH_KEY DESC")
FROM NH_D_DEPT_MONTH t LEFT JOIN NH_D_DEPT_MONTH t4 ON t4.MONTH_KEY = LEFT(CONVERT(VARCHAR(10),dateadd(mm,-1,CONVERT(date,t.MONTH_KEY+'-01'))),7) AND T.DEPT_ID = T4.DEPT_ID AND t.ITEM_CODE = T4.ITEM_CODE LEFT JOIN NH_DEPT t2 ON t.DEPT_ID = t2.id LEFT JOIN NH_ITEM t3 ON t3.STANDARD_CODE = T.ITEM_CODE
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM NH_D_DEPT_MONTH t LEFT JOIN NH_DEPT t2 ON t.DEPT_ID = t2.id LEFT JOIN NH_ITEM t3 ON t3.STANDARD_CODE = T.ITEM_CODE

SELECT t.DEPT_ID as deptId, t.ITEM_CODE, T3.NAME AS itemName, t2.NAME as deptName, NVL(ROUND(SUM(t.TOTAL_MONTH_VALUE),0),0) TOTAL_MONTH_VALUE, NVL(ROUND(SUM(t.TOTAL_MONTH_VALUE/t2.AREA),2),0) as untilEle, NVL(ROUND(t2.AREA,0),0) AS area FROM NH_D_DEPT_MONTH t LEFT JOIN NH_DEPT t2 ON t.DEPT_ID = t2.id LEFT JOIN NH_ITEM t3 ON t3.STANDARD_CODE = T.ITEM_CODE
GROUP BY t.dept_id,t.item_code,t3.name,t2.name,nvl(round(t2.area,0),0) #order($_parameter.condition,"t.ITEM_CODE")

SELECT t.DEPT_ID as deptId, t.ITEM_CODE, T3.NAME AS itemName, t2.NAME as deptName, isnull(ROUND(SUM(t.TOTAL_MONTH_VALUE),0),0) TOTAL_MONTH_VALUE, cast(( CASE WHEN ISNULL(ROUND(t2.AREA,0),0) =0 THEN NULLIF(ROUND(SUM(t.TOTAL_MONTH_VALUE / NULL),2), 0) ELSE NULLIF(ROUND(SUM(t.TOTAL_MONTH_VALUE / t2.AREA),2), 0) END ) as Decimal) AS untilEle, ISNULL(ROUND(t2.AREA,0),0) AS area
#order($_parameter.condition,"t.ITEM_CODE")
FROM NH_D_DEPT_MONTH t LEFT JOIN NH_DEPT t2 ON t.DEPT_ID = t2.id LEFT JOIN NH_ITEM t3 ON t3.STANDARD_CODE = T.ITEM_CODE
GROUP BY t.dept_id,t.item_code,t3.name,t2.name,ISNULL(round(t2.area,0),0)
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT T.DEPT_ID,T.ITEM_CODE,T3.NAME,T2.NAME FROM NH_D_DEPT_MONTH t LEFT JOIN NH_DEPT t2 ON t.DEPT_ID = t2.id LEFT JOIN NH_ITEM t3 ON t3.STANDARD_CODE = T.ITEM_CODE )A

#if($_databaseId == 'oracle') SELECT * from( select T1.ID as deptId, T1.NAME as deptName, NVL(A.TOTAL_MONTH_VALUE,0) TOTAL_MONTH_VALUE FROM ( SELECT T2.DEPT_ID, nvl(round(sum(t2.TOTAL_MONTH_VALUE),0),0) TOTAL_MONTH_VALUE FROM NH_D_DEPT_MONTH T2 #where() 1=1 #if($_parameter.start) AND T2.MONTH_KEY >= @{_parameter.start} #end #if($_parameter.end) AND T2.MONTH_KEY <= @{_parameter.end} #end #end group by t2.dept_id ) A RIGHT JOIN VIEW_NH_D_DEPT t1 ON t1.id = A .dept_id #where() t1.NH_RANK = 1 #end ORDER BY nvl(A .TOTAL_MONTH_VALUE,0) DESC) where ROWNUM <=10 #else select TOP 10 T1.ID as deptId, T1.NAME as deptName, ISNULL(A.TOTAL_MONTH_VALUE,0) TOTAL_MONTH_VALUE FROM ( SELECT T2.DEPT_ID, isnull(round(sum(t2.TOTAL_MONTH_VALUE),0),0) TOTAL_MONTH_VALUE FROM NH_D_DEPT_MONTH T2 #where() 1=1 #if($_parameter.start) AND T2.MONTH_KEY >= @{_parameter.start} #end #if($_parameter.end) AND T2.MONTH_KEY <= @{_parameter.end} #end #end group by t2.dept_id ) A RIGHT JOIN VIEW_NH_D_DEPT t1 ON t1.id = A .dept_id #where() t1.NH_RANK = 1 #end ORDER BY isnull(A .TOTAL_MONTH_VALUE,0) DESC #end

SELECT A.ID DEPT_ID, A.PID as parentId, A.NAME as deptName, #if($_databaseId=='oracle') NVL(ROUND(SUM (B.TOTAL_MONTH_VALUE),0),0) total, CASE when NVL(ROUND(SUM(B.TOTAL_YOY),0),0) < NVL(ROUND(SUM (B.TOTAL_MONTH_VALUE),0),0) then 1 when NVL(ROUND(SUM(B.TOTAL_YOY),0),0) = NVL(ROUND(SUM (B.TOTAL_MONTH_VALUE),0),0) then 0 #else ISNULL(ROUND(SUM (B.TOTAL_MONTH_VALUE),0),0) total, CASE when ISNULL(ROUND(SUM(B.TOTAL_YOY),0),0) < ISNULL(ROUND(SUM (B.TOTAL_MONTH_VALUE),0),0) then 1 when ISNULL(ROUND(SUM(B.TOTAL_YOY),0),0) = ISNULL(ROUND(SUM (B.TOTAL_MONTH_VALUE),0),0) then 0 #end else -1 end as tb FROM VIEW_NH_D_DEPT A LEFT JOIN( SELECT t.* FROM NH_D_DEPT_MONTH t INNER JOIN #if($_databaseId=='oracle') TABLE(func_getnhitem(@{_parameter.nhType,jdbcType=NUMERIC},@{_parameter.itemCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR})) #else func_getnhitem(@{_parameter.nhType,jdbcType=NUMERIC},@{_parameter.itemCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) #end t2 ON t.ITEM_CODE=t2.standard_code where 1=1 #if($_parameter.startTime) AND t.MONTH_KEY >=@{_parameter.startTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} #end #if($_parameter.endTime) AND t.MONTH_KEY <=@{_parameter.endTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} #end #if($_parameter.monthKey && $_parameter.monthKey != '') AND t.MONTH_KEY = @{_parameter.monthKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR} #end ) B ON A.ID=B.DEPT_ID GROUP BY A.ID, A.NAME, A.PID ORDER BY A.ID

SELECT t.MONTH_KEY,sum(t.TOTAL_MONTH_VALUE) total,sum(t.TOTAL_YOY) TOTAL_YOY FROM NH_D_DEPT_MONTH t INNER JOIN #if($_databaseId=='oracle') TABLE(func_getnhitem(@{_parameter.nhType,jdbcType=NUMERIC},@{_parameter.itemCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR})) #else func_getnhitem(@{_parameter.nhType,jdbcType=NUMERIC},@{_parameter.itemCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) #end t2 ON t.ITEM_CODE=t2.standard_code INNER JOIN VIEW_NH_D_DEPT A ON t.DEPT_ID = A.id where 1=1 #if($_parameter.startTime) AND t.MONTH_KEY >=@{_parameter.startTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} #end #if($_parameter.endTime) AND t.MONTH_KEY <=@{_parameter.endTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} #end #if($_parameter.deptId) and t.DEPT_ID = @{_parameter.deptId,jdbcType=NUMERIC} #else and A.CODE='ROOT' #end GROUP BY t.MONTH_KEY

SELECT ROUND(sum(t.MONTH_DAYTIME_VALUE),0) MONTH_DAYTIME_VALUE,ROUND(sum(t.MONTH_NIGHT_VALUE),0) MONTH_NIGHT_VALUE FROM NH_D_DEPT_MONTH t INNER JOIN #if($_databaseId=='oracle') TABLE(func_getnhitem(@{_parameter.nhType,jdbcType=NUMERIC},@{_parameter.itemCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR})) #else func_getnhitem(@{_parameter.nhType,jdbcType=NUMERIC},@{_parameter.itemCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) #end t2 ON t.ITEM_CODE=t2.standard_code INNER JOIN VIEW_NH_D_DEPT A ON t.DEPT_ID = A.id where 1=1 #if($_parameter.startTime) AND t.MONTH_KEY >=@{_parameter.startTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} #end #if($_parameter.endTime) AND t.MONTH_KEY <=@{_parameter.endTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} #end #if($_parameter.deptId) and t.DEPT_ID = @{_parameter.deptId,jdbcType=NUMERIC} #else and A.CODE='ROOT' #end

#if($_databaseId =='oracle') select * from ( SELECT t1.ID as deptId, t1.NAME as deptName, nvl(ROUND(SUM (a.TOTAL_MONTH_VALUE),0),0) AS TOTAL_MONTH_VALUE, nvl(ROUND(cast(t1.AREA as NUMERIC),0), 0) AS AREA, nvl(ROUND(SUM (a.TOTAL_MONTH_VALUE/cast(t1.AREA as NUMERIC)),2), 0) AS untilEle FROM (SELECT T2.DEPT_ID, t2.TOTAL_MONTH_VALUE FROM NH_D_DEPT_MONTH T2 #where() 1=1 #if($_parameter.start) AND MONTH_KEY >= @{_parameter.start} #end #if($_parameter.end) AND MONTH_KEY <= @{_parameter.end} #end #end ) A RIGHT JOIN VIEW_NH_D_DEPT t1 ON t1.id = A .dept_id #where() t1.NH_RANK = 1 #end GROUP BY t1.NAME, t1.ID, NVL(ROUND(cast(t1.AREA as NUMERIC),0), 0) ORDER BY nvl(ROUND(SUM (a.TOTAL_MONTH_VALUE/cast(t1.AREA as NUMERIC)),2), 0) DESC) where ROWNUM <=10 #else SELECT TOP 10 t1.ID as deptId, t1.NAME as deptName, ISNULL(ROUND(SUM (a.TOTAL_MONTH_VALUE),0),0) AS TOTAL_MONTH_VALUE, ISNULL(ROUND(cast(t1.AREA as NUMERIC),0), 0) AS AREA, ISNULL(ROUND(SUM (a.TOTAL_MONTH_VALUE/cast(t1.AREA as NUMERIC)),2), 0) AS untilEle FROM (SELECT T2.DEPT_ID, t2.TOTAL_MONTH_VALUE FROM NH_D_DEPT_MONTH T2 #where() 1=1 #if($_parameter.start) AND MONTH_KEY >= @{_parameter.start} #end #if($_parameter.end) AND MONTH_KEY <= @{_parameter.end} #end #end ) A RIGHT JOIN VIEW_NH_D_DEPT t1 ON t1.id = A .dept_id #where() t1.NH_RANK = 1 #end GROUP BY t1.NAME, t1.ID, ISNULL(ROUND(cast(t1.AREA as NUMERIC),0), 0) ORDER BY ISNULL(ROUND(SUM (a.TOTAL_MONTH_VALUE/cast(t1.AREA as NUMERIC)),2), 0) DESC #end

SELECT t.STANDARD_CODE ITEM_CODE, t.NAME itemName, #if($_databaseId=='oracle') nvl( ( SELECT ROUND(SUM (d.TOTAL_MONTH_VALUE),0) FROM NH_D_DEPT_MONTH d INNER JOIN #if($_databaseId=='oracle') TABLE(func_getnhitem(1, t.STANDARD_CODE)) #else func_getnhitem(1, t.STANDARD_CODE) #end i ON d.ITEM_CODE = i.STANDARD_CODE INNER JOIN VIEW_NH_D_DEPT A ON A.ID=D.DEPT_ID where 1=1 #if($_parameter.startTime) AND d.MONTH_KEY >=@{_parameter.startTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} #end #if($_parameter.endTime) AND d.MONTH_KEY <=@{_parameter.endTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} #end #if($_parameter.deptId) and d.DEPT_ID = @{_parameter.deptId,jdbcType=NUMERIC} #else and a.CODE='ROOT' #end ),0) #else ISNULL(( SELECT ROUND(SUM (d.TOTAL_MONTH_VALUE),0) FROM NH_D_DEPT_MONTH d INNER JOIN #if($_databaseId=='oracle') TABLE(func_getnhitem(@{_parameter.nhType,jdbcType=NUMERIC},t.STANDARD_CODE)) #else func_getnhitem(@{_parameter.nhType,jdbcType=NUMERIC},t.STANDARD_CODE) #end i ON d.ITEM_CODE = i.STANDARD_CODE INNER JOIN VIEW_NH_D_DEPT A ON A.ID=D.DEPT_ID where 1=1 #if($_parameter.startTime) AND d.MONTH_KEY >=@{_parameter.startTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} #end #if($_parameter.endTime) AND d.MONTH_KEY <=@{_parameter.endTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} #end #if($_parameter.deptId) and d.DEPT_ID = @{_parameter.deptId,jdbcType=NUMERIC} #else and a.CODE='ROOT' #end ),0) #end TOTAL FROM NH_ITEM t WHERE t.NH_TYPE = @{_parameter.nhType,jdbcType=NUMERIC} AND t.PARENT_CODE=@{_parameter.parentCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by t.STANDARD_CODE
